empresa_unica: Every company is unique, so we manage employees' daily mobility according to their needs.
transforma_movilidad: Transform your company's mobility with our intelligent corporate carpooling platform.
coche_privado: Private cars are the main source of emissions. Reducing their use cuts the carbon footprint and congestion around your company.
coche_compartido: Car sharing boosts team well-being and cohesion, improves employees' daily experience, and lets you deduct mobility-related expenses.
ahorro_infraestructuras: Save on infrastructure, reduce parking demand, and make daily commutes more efficient for employees.
ponlo_marcha: Get it running in your company
integra_negocio: Integrate SharetoGo into your business and start transforming corporate mobility today.
transforma_empleados: Start today and transform your employees' mobility.
contacto_servicio: Get in touch with our specialized customer service team.
carpooling_sencillo: Implementing corporate carpooling has never been so simple.
registro_usuarios: Users sign up with their email and set their travel preferences.
matching_algoritmo: Our algorithm automatically connects employees with compatible routes and schedules.
trayecto_seguro: They share the ride safely with rating systems and feedback from other users.
footer_siguenos: Follow us and join the community
coche_respuesta: If the company requests a closed service for its employees, the car belongs to one of the employees. The idea is that they organize themselves so there is always someone offering seats and others booking them. If the company allows employees to share rides with any app user, the car can belong to any of our verified users.
beneficios_pregunta: If I act as a driver, what are the financial benefits?
beneficios_respuesta: They depend on how often you use the platform and the number of available seats you offer. We guarantee that half of the trip costs are covered on every shared ride.
pasajeros_respuesta: Yes. Depending on the distance, passengers pay one amount or another. We keep fares as low as possible to stay highly competitive with other alternatives.
gastos_pregunta: What costs are associated for the company?
gastos_respuesta: The company and SharetoGo evaluate the situation together and reach the best possible agreement. Requesting a trial can be the first step.
servicios_pregunta: Besides mobility management, can the company benefit from other services?
servicios_respuesta: Yes. Through the website, the company can access an intranet with all its general data and employee-level data closely tied to sustainability and compliance with new regulations.
obligatorio_pregunta: Is it mandatory to go and return with the same person?
obligatorio_respuesta: No. Driver: you don‚Äôt have to take the same people on the outbound and return trips unless you published a journey covering both legs. Passenger: you don‚Äôt have to return in the same car you used to leave unless you booked a round trip with the same driver.
espera_pregunta: How long should I wait if the driver or passenger doesn‚Äôt arrive?
espera_respuesta: Driver: wait for passengers at the agreed meeting point for at least 15 minutes after the scheduled time. Passenger: wait for the driver at the agreed meeting point for at least 15 minutes after the scheduled time.
anulacion_pregunta: If I cancel, is the money refunded?
anulacion_respuesta: Driver: if the driver cancels the trip after receiving payment, they must refund passengers the full amount. If the driver arrives more than 20 minutes late, the full amount is also refunded to the passenger. Passenger: if you cancel 24 hours in advance, you receive a full refund; if you cancel less than 24 hours but more than 30 minutes before the trip, the amount is split half for the driver and half for the passenger; if you cancel less than 30 minutes before departure, you don‚Äôt receive a refund and the driver gets the full amount.
politicas_pregunta: Where can I find all the details of SharetoGo‚Äôs policies?
politicas_respuesta: Email us at contactosharetogo@gmail.com or call us via the contact section with any questions. You can also visit our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions of Use.

hero_sub: Act as a driver and/or passenger

qs_hero_texto: We are the team behind the corporate carpooling revolution, committed to creating a more sustainable and connected future for companies.
qs_mision_texto:
At SharetoGo, we believe that sharing moves us. We have developed an intelligent and sustainable solution to promote corporate carpooling in Spain, connecting people with available seats to those who share a similar origin or destination.

Our goal is to encourage sustainable mobility in companies and specific areas, reducing traffic, costs, and CO‚ÇÇ emissions. In addition, we provide precise environmental impact metrics, helping organizations meet their ESG goals and sustainable mobility plans.

SharetoGo stands for innovation, collaboration, and commitment to a more efficient, responsible, and connected future.
qs_impacto_texto: Thanks to SharetoGo, these are some of the figures that reflect our commitment to sustainable mobility.
qs_equipo_texto: We are a group of people working ambitiously every day to bring about a change in citizens‚Äô mobility habits. For us, keeping the team united and connected has always been a cornerstone and priority so that the initial idea could materialize into a solid mobile application project. This is just the starting line. Together, we‚Äôll make it happen.
od_titulo: Which SDGs do we contribute to?
od_texto: SharetoGo promotes collaborative mobility aligned with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.
od3_desc: Less pollution and traffic for better air quality.
od9_desc: Smart mobility through technology and shared routes.
